tool_description: a api from where you can get trending memes from reddit or fetch individually
name: Memeful
title: Memeful

api_list.name: Get memes from a subreddit
api_list.description: you can get the post title and image from here

api_list.name: Get trending memes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://memeful.p.rapidapi.com/memes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "memeful.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://memeful.p.rapidapi.com/memes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "memeful.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
